name: Esteban Tuero
introduction: Esteban Tuero (born April 22, 1978 in Buenos Aires, Argentina) is a motor racing driver who competed in Formula One with the Minardi in 1998.  At the age of just 19, Tuero was (at the time) the third youngest driver ever to start a race on his dbut, after Mike Thackwell and Ricardo Rodrguez (Tuero is now fifth-youngest, now behind Jaime Alguersuari and Fernando Alonso).
